attributes.action: Wipe Peoples Credit History and give the consumer a 2nd Chance like you did the banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wipe Peoples Credit History and give the consumer a 2nd Chance like you did the banks and/or Rethink and improve a system which is better for everyone as people with bad credit don't get the chance to improve it & the state of the econmics at the moment with people reciving defaults and late payments which are causing there credit scores to drop so in turn gives the ones who need to borrow to help them selfs get the higher intrest rates (if anything at all) etc which is harder to pay and pushes them further into debt and normal living harder.
